column1: Origins: Jazz originated in the African-American communities of New Orleans
column3: in the late 19th and early 20th centuries

column1: Improvisation: A key feature of jazz music is improvisation
column2: allowing musicians to spontaneously create melodies and harmonies during a performance.

column1: Influential Figures: Some of the most influential jazz musicians include Louis Armstrong

column3: saw jazz become highly popular in the United States and then worldwide
